summary: Ten people arrive at a secluded mountain resort to find it completely deserted. With no gas for the return trip, the visitors are forced to stay and investigate the mystery surrounding the abandoned lodge.
cast: Mena Suvari|Fiona Gubelmann|Joanne Kelly|Brian Austin Green|Robert Picardo|Zack Ward|Boots Southerland|David de Lautour|Leif Gantvoort|Samantha Jacober|Curtiss Frisle|Emelie O'Hara|Nathan Lorbietzki
keywords: sex scene|panties|strip poker|car trouble|no cell phone signal
title: Don't Blink
